name: Poll And Survey plugin
author: TechMix

sections.description:
This poll and survey plugin allows you to run any customized survey, poll or vote in your website. It could help you to get visitors/users openions easily. You can run any kind of survey by using this plugin. There are quite a lot of benefits for using this Poll And survey plugin like:

  • Super easy to use
  • Unique design
  • Inclued customized voting system
  • It is a powerful survey tool
  • You can engage more visitors/users by poll and survey
  • Widget support
  • Shortcode support
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload plugin zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. You can do this using ‘Upload’ functionality provided in plugins section of your wordpress dashboard
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance >> Widgets and drag Poll And survey plugin in to your WordPress sidebar
sections.faq:
What does Poll And survey plugin do?

Poll And survey plugin basically help you to cust vote/survey/poll from your visitors/users. You could reduce bounce rate by engaging visitors/users for a long time. If you run any hot topics survey/poll/vote, your visitors will definetly share this to cust more vote to win his/her supporting team or openion.

Dose Poll And survey plugin support widget?

Yes. This Poll And survey plugin for wordpress support widget.

Dose Poll And survey plugin support shortcode?

Yes. This Poll And survey plugin for wordpress support shortcode. It could help you to display your poll/survey/vote anywhere in your website.
sections.changelog: =Poll And survey plugin for wordpress Ready to use=
